message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

This paper proposes a new algorithm for proximal policy optimization (PPO) for continuous action control. The algorithm involves adaptive multi-batch experience replay, which is a technique commonly used in reinforcement learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also includes experiments on various continuous control tasks, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.CV (Computer Vision) sub-categories.
